description:
As the town bustles in preparation for the upcoming ordination ceremony, Ocoho leaves quietly, avoiding being seen. Lord Brangoire grows suspicious of her behavior and attacks her. Melie stops him, but is shocked to see Ocoho starting to call forth a Spectre Nemesis. Seth stops Ocoho when she appears to go on a blind rampage, but when she returns to her senses, she doesn`t remember anything that`s happened. It`s clear that someone is manipulating her, but who is it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La vérité est comme une malédiction: Ocoho
Shinjitsu wa Noroi no You ni: Ocoho
The Truth Is Like a Curse: Ocoho
